name: Fluffles
overview: This is an arcade game for one player only. It should work on any Amiga with a mouse. You must keep the Fluffles bouncing on the trampoline. If any Fluffle stops bouncing, the game is over. This can be loaded from the Workbench or cli. A high score file is automatically created to keep your high scores on. A fun, VERY addictive game.
